description: Converts Prometheus range query JSON into metric-type aware summaries for agentic pipelines and AI-Ops.

documentation_notes.README.md: Main user-facing documentation - update this first
documentation_notes.PKG-INFO: Package metadata - auto-generated but should be kept in sync with README.md
documentation_notes.auto_generated: SOURCES.txt and other .egg-info files are auto-generated during package build - do not edit manually
documentation_notes.output_format: All metric types return: count/num_data_points, timestamps, duration. Counter/Gauge use 'count', Histogram/Summary use 'num_data_points' + 'count' (observations)

metric_types.gauge: count, start/end values, min/max/mean/median/stddev, trend, change
metric_types.histogram: num_data_points, count (observations), sum, avg, quantiles (p50/p90/p95/p99), dominant_bucket
